resources.string: An Error occurred while saving, try again!
In order to use this app we need to get storage access permissions from you to access status posts.\nAll files will be stored local and will NOT be uploaded or shared with anyone else.
This app can\'t work without storage permissions!
Something went wrong, try again or contact the developer!
We care about your privacy and data security. We keep this app free by using third party services.
We use ads in this app. This service (Including its partners) collects unique identifiers and other personal data. You can change your choice at any time in the app settings.

string.name: gdpr_text_three
string.u: Learn more about this service and your personal data.

resources.string: Can we continue to use your data for these purposes as well as for showing personalized ads?
By agreeing, you are confirming that you are over the age of 16.
I understand that I will still see ads, but they may not be as relevant to my interests.
We use the following third party services in this app:
Click on a service to check out its privacy policy.
